title: Sanders Endorses, Obama To Dallas, Trump's VP
description: Bernie Sanders endorsed Hillary Clinton and President Obama visited Dallas, as we inch closer to learning who will be Donald Trump's running mate. This episode: host/White House correspondent Tamara Keith, political editor Domenico Montanaro, and national political correspondent Mara Liasson. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
